data.title: Funeral Card Collection
data.text:
ACGSI Funeral Card Collection

Se

• Back to Records • Back to Allen County Funeral Card Collection

To contribute funeral cards to this collection, please email scanned images to the ACGSI webmaster at adam@barrone.net. We are primarily interested in funeral cards from Allen County and surrounding counties, but we will add funeral cards from other areas to the collection as time permits. You may also submit funeral cards by mail:

ACGSI Webmaster

P.O. Box 12003

Fort Wayne, IN 46862

Photocopies are acceptable. If you send originals and want them returned, please include a SASE.
